howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how to participate in prediction markets

steps.title: Choose a Market
steps.description: Browse available markets and find events you're interested in predicting.

steps.title: Make Your Prediction
steps.description: Buy YES or NO shares based on your belief about the outcome.

steps.title: Trade Anytime
steps.description: Change your position by buying or selling shares as new information emerges.

steps.title: Get Rewarded
steps.description: If your prediction is correct, earn profits when the market resolves.
